lines.text: You can call me Ellie.
If I call you, it'll be collect.
Don't be such a coward!
Who's a coward? I'm as brave as they go, and I'm going.

[about the unconscious Sheriff in the rising water]
He's got one foot in heaven and one in a Turkish bath.
Say, what kind of town is this anyway?
A town where meddlers should carry heavy life insurance.
Why, look! There are two buzzards making a nest out of hay.

[Paranoid]
Oh, no, they're not. They're probably drawing straws to see who gets me!

[In the dark cellar]
I wonder what a ghost would say if he walked in here and saw us?
He'd probably say, "Hello, girls" because I wouldn't be here.

[Looking a beetle-shaped brooch]
What I've always wanted... a Japanese beetle!
What makes you think it's a Japanese beetle?
It's got a yellow belly.

[threatening Wally with a gun]
Git back agin that wall!

[cowardly]
Thanks. I need something to hold me up.

[Amid rising water]
Someone help me up! I don't want to drown like a rat!
Well, you oughta know how!

[Panicked]
Oh, I hope I wake up in the morning and find it's all a dream!
I hope I wake up!

[after failing to walk through a wall]
Pardon me. I thought I was Mr. Jordan!
What are you... a moron?
Yeah, and well-organized!
